ctx: intros T a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System a, b, c, d : Term H1 : SysPrf T (equal a b) H2 : SysPrf T (equal c d) Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNN) (_ : Prf LNN Axm (andH ?M1457 ?M1458)), forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) ?M1456 g" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNN) (_ : Prf LNN Axm (equal (Plus a c) (Plus b d))), forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) T g".

ctx: intros T a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (andH f g) T : System a, b, c, d : Term x : fol.Formulas LNN x0 : Prf LNN x (equal c d) H2 : forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g x -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) T g x1 : fol.Formulas LNN x2 : Prf LNN x1 (equal a b) H1 : forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g x1 -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) T g Unable to unify "T ?M4757" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNN) (_ : Prf LNN Axm (equal (Plus b c) (Plus a c))), forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) T g".

ctx: intros T a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros T a b c d H1 H2.
apply eqTrans with (Plus c b); auto using eqSym, eqRefl.

apply eqTrans with (Plus c b); auto using eqSym, eqRefl.

original: intros T a b c d H1 H2. apply andI. - apply eqTrans with (Plus b c). + apply eqSym. apply H1. + apply eqTrans with (Plus c b); auto using eqSym, eqRefl. - apply eqTrans with (Plus b d). + apply eqSym. apply H2. + apply eqTrans with (Plus d b); auto using eqSym, eqRefl.
